title: By the Mayor whereas the Lord Mayor and aldermen of the City of London have lately received a letter from His Majesty, requiring them to take care ... for the effectual suppressing of all conventicles and unlawful meetings ...
author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
notes: Title from first eight lines of text.
"Dated the 15th day of January, in the four and thirtieth year of His Majesties reign. -- Wagstaffe".
This item appears at reel 768:4 as Wing L2885A (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 1745:17 as Wing (2nd ed.) L2886G.
Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library and Guildhall Library (London, England).
